name: Wu-chi Feng
content: Wu-chi Feng Home Page Wu-chi Feng Chair and professor, Computer Science Past Administrative Roles Special Advisor to the Provost on Strategic Initiatives, Office of Academic Affairs (2022-2023) Interim Dean, Maseeh College of Engineering and Computer Science (2021-2022) Associate Dean for Research, Maseeh College of Engineering and Computer Science (2020-2021) Chair, Computer Science Department (2007-2010, 2016-2019) Brief Bio: I am a Professor in the Department of Computer Science and am a member of the Intel Systems and Networking Group. Before joining PSU in 2004, I was an Associate Professor at the OGI School of Science and Engineering at OHSU (2001-2004) and an Assistant Professor at The Ohio State University (1996-2001). I received my M.S. and Ph.D. degrees from the University of Michigan in Computer Science and Engineering. I received my B.S. degree from the Pennsylvania State University in Computer Engineering Research My research interests include: Multimedia systems Video streaming protocols Video compression systems Scalable and adaptable video distribution infrastructures I have a number of publications that deal with a number of topics including video streaming and networking. My publications My Ph.D. thesis: Video-On-Demand Services: Efficient Transportation and Decompression of Variable Bit Rate Video [Click for PDF] [Click for Table of Contents] Click here to see the book that I've written on buffering techniques for digital video: Buffering Techniques for Delivery of Compressed Video in Video-on-Demand Systems , Springer, 1997. Teaching I generally teach the following courses: CS 201 - Computer Systems Programming CS 305 - Social, Ethical, and Legal Implications of Computing CS 348U - Digital Media, Technology, and Society (Junior Cluster Course) CS 430P/530 - Internet, Web, and Cloud Systems CS 490/590 - Introduction to Multimedia Computing and Networking CS 410/510 - Advanced Topics in Multimedia Systems I have also taught Intro. to Computer Networking and Intro. to Operating Systems, but not recently. Recent External Service Steering Committee Chair - Multimedia Systems Conference Series (2010-2020) Technical Steering Committee Chair - International Multimedia Telecommunications Consortium (2012-2015) An Editor for the Multimedia Systems Journal (2004 - 2016) Program Committee Member â International Workshop on Network and Operating Systems Support for Digital Audio and Video 2022 (NOSSDAV '22) Program Committee Member â ACM Multimedia Systems Conference 2022 Program Committee Member â International Workshop on Network and Operating Systems Support for Digital Audio and Video 2021 (NOSSDAV '21) Program Committee Member â ACM Multimedia Systems Conference 2021 Program Committee Member â International Workshop on Network and Operating Systems Support for Digital Audio and Video 2020 (NOSSDAV '20) Program Committee Member â ACM Multimedia Systems Conference 2020 Program Committee Member â 29th International Workshop on Network and Operating Systems Support for Digital Audio and Video 2019 (NOSSDAV '19) Program Committee Member â ACM Multimedia Systems Conference 2019 Program Committee Member â 28th International Workshop on Network and Operating Systems Support for Digital Audio and Video 2018 (NOSSDAV '18) Program Committee Member â ACM Multimedia Systems Conference 2018 Program Committee - ACM Multimedia Conference, 2017 Program Committee Member â 27th International Workshop on Network and Operating Systems Support for Digital Audio and Video 2017 (NOSSDAV '17) Program Committee Member â ACM Multimedia Systems Conference 2017 Program Committee Co-Chair â IEEE International Conference on Distributed Computing Systems (ICDCS) 2016 Program Committee Member â 26th International Workshop on Network and Operating Systems Support for Digital Audio and Video 2016 (NOSSDAV '16) Program Committee Member â ACM Multimedia Systems Conference 2016 Program Committee Track Co-chair (Systems and Middleware) - ACM Multimedia Conference, October 2015 Program Committee Co-chair - IEEE/ACM International Symposium on Quality of Service, June 2015 Program Committee Member - International Packet Video Workshop, May/June 2015 Program Committee Co-chair - 25th ACM International Workshop on Network and Operating Systems Support for Digital Audio and Video 2015 Program Committee Co-Chair - ACM Multimedia Systems 2015 Program Committee Member - Mobile Video 2014 Program Committee Member - 24th ACM International Workshop on Network and Operating Systems Support for Digital Audio and Video 2014 Program Committee - ACM Multimedia Systems 2014 Click here for a relatively complete list of my conference service activities.
